## uniform distribution

### in R

```{r}
seed <- 71
N <- 100000

unif_R <- runif(N)

unif_R %>% head(10)
unif_R %>% mean()
```


### in Numpy

```{python}
import numpy as np

seed = int(r.seed)
N = int(r.N)

np.random.seed(seed=seed)
unif_np = np.random.rand(N)

unif_np[:10]
np.mean(unif_np)
```

### in Random

```{python}
import random

random.seed(seed)

unif_rd = np.array([random.random() for i in range(N)])

unif_rd[:10]

np.mean(unif_rd)
```
